CIRCUMCISION.Definition: cut off the foreskin of (a young boy or man, especially a baby) as a religious rite, especially in Judaism and Islam, or as a medical treatment

COLONIES.Definition: a country or area under the full or partial political control of another country and occupied by settlers from that country

CONVERSATION STARTER.Definition: topics that can be used to start conversations, similar to ice-breakers

FALLING OUT OF SYNC.Definition: when two things no longer happen at the same time

LEAP YEAR.Definition: a year, occurring once every four years, which has 366 days including 29 February as an intercalary day

MYRIAD.Definition: a countless or extremely great number of people or things

PAGAN.Definition: a member of a modern religious movement which seeks to incorporate beliefs or practices from outside the main world religions, especially nature worship

RETICENT.Definition: not revealing one's thoughts or feelings readily

TIMELY.Definition: done or occurring at a favourable or useful time; opportune

TOASTED.Definition: drink to the health or in honour of (someone or something) by raising one's glass together with others

TOPICAL.Definition: (of a subject) of immediate relevance, interest, or importance owing to its relation to current events
